metadata.description: Multi-agent architecture for Claude Code with Waldo (planner) and The Architect (executor). Includes parallel sub-agent execution, comprehensive project-memory system with one-command initialization, agent registry, workflow patterns, and conversational planning integration.

plugins.name: intuition
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestration platform featuring Waldo (planning thought partner) and The Architect (execution orchestrator) with 6 specialized sub-agents. Includes streamlined project initialization with AGENTS.md configuration, project-memory system, parallel task execution, and integrated project planning.
